column6: IN TIME FOR HEROIC AGE...A  BOLD NEW ERA IN WEB OF SPIDER-MAN!  With an Age of Heroes unfolding around him, Superhero-Critic-in-Chief, Mayor J. Jonah Jameson, finds himself the target of a vicious assassination plot courtesy of a pro-super human vigilante in THE EXTREMIST - PART 1!  Rated T  ...$3.99
